experience.description: Built management supporting tools and robot process automation to help businesses attain their goal and make important decisions. Tracked and fixed bugs for existing tools for some of our top clients. Trained interns and clients on usage and maintainability of our software.

Developed a software to connect and extract analytical data from an eluminocity GmbH electric vehicle charging station. Deployed a raspberry pi to bridge between the charging station and Silver Springs Networks routers, in order to send this information to their backend.
